User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110223 Firefox/4.0b13pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110223 Firefox/4.0b13pre

There's should be an option (in about:config), in which you can specify the key lengh of the symmetric cipher which's to be preffered.

Reproducible: Always
